text.__SUMMARY__: Brachystomia omaensis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The length of an adult shell varies between 3 mm and 5 mm.
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the Pacific Ocean off Japan and the Philippines.
text.References: Higo, S., Callomon, P. & Goto, Y., 1999. Catalogue and bibliography of the marine shell-bearing Mollusca of Japan. Osaka. Elle Scientific Publications, . 749.
